member.name: T:Clayster.Library.Language.Component_Translators.ComponentTranslator
member.summary: The base class for all specific Component Translators. If the component has properties that are not available as simple string values properties, a component translator needs to be created for that type. Otherwise the type needs to be translated manually.

member.name: M:Clayster.Library.Language.Component_Translators.ComponentTranslator.#ctor
member.summary: The base class for all specific Component Translators. If the component has properties that are not available as simple string values properties, a component translator needs to be created for that type. Otherwise the type needs to be translated manually.

member.name: M:Clayster.Library.Language.Component_Translators.ComponentTranslator.Translate(System.Object,Clayster.Library.Language.LanguageComponent,System.Object,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Translates a component of the given type.
member.param: Language object corresponding to the given component.
If the component is begin translated for the first time (true) or if it is a re-translation (false).

member.name: P:Clayster.Library.Language.Component_Translators.ComponentTranslator.TranslatesType
member.summary: Returns the type the translator recognizes.

member.summary: Interface used by all translatable classes. By making a class translatable objects of it can be registered for automatic re-translation when a user changes his language settings.

member.summary: Translates the object. The method is called by the static Translator class when the language changes, if the object is registered with it.

member.name: T:Clayster.Library.Language.LanguageMasterPage
member.summary: Base class for all Language Sensitive Master Pages. There's no automatic translation of controls only placed on the master side (since all controls are translated by the detail page). However, the LanguageMasterPage publishes String-methods and a virtual Translate() mathod that helps developers to easily translate strings and controls on the master page.

member.name: M:Clayster.Library.Language.LanguageMasterPage.GetDefaultLanguage
member.summary: Returns a string containing the language to use for the page.

member.name: M:Clayster.Library.Language.LanguageMasterPage.String(System.Int32,System.String)
member.param: Default value. This value will be used if the string id is not found.

member.name: M:Clayster.Library.Language.LanguageMasterPage.String(System.Int32,System.String,System.Object[])
member.param: Default value. This value will be used if the string id is not found.
Parameters to use to format the string. The first parameter replaces any occurrances of %0% in the string, the second replaces any %1% and so forth.

member.name: M:Clayster.Library.Language.LanguageMasterPage.String(System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.param: Name of the module to use
Default value. This value will be used if the string id is not found.

member.param: Name of the module to use
Default value. This value will be used if the string id is not found.
Parameters to use to format the string. The first parameter replaces any occurrances of %0% in the string, the second replaces any %1% and so forth.
